p: The title compound was prepared from N-{3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)pyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl]phenyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide and 5-amino-2-(1H-pyrrol-1-yl)benzonitrile in a manner analogous to Example 27, Step D. 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO-d 6) δ 6.33 (t, 2H, J = 2.0 Hz), 6.71 (d, 1H, J = 5.2 Hz), 7.17-7.22 (m, 3H), 7.28 (t, 2H, J = 8.0 Hz), 7.41 (d, 1 H, J = 7.7 Hz), 7.50-7.63 (m, 4H), 7.85 (d, 1 H, J = 7.7 Hz), 8.02-8.05 (m, 2H), 8.41 (m, 3H), 8.91 (d, 1 H, J = 6.9 Hz), 10.10 (s, 1 H), 10.96 (s, 1 H); ESIMS (M+H) + = 609.
